dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints, form lines, and spot heights. Depth shown by bathymetric tints. "Plate 48." "Maps of Central Europe." Ancillary maps: Athens (1:300,000), and of the Dardanelles and Bosporus (1:500,000). Verso: Index to section maps of Central Europe. "'The Times' Atlas." Map shows shipping routes with distances.
